bug.summary: Spacy BERT model failed to download the model bin and config
bug.description:
I am working in behind proxy, hence I can't download Spacy's model from my code. So, I use to direct download my model and install them manually(pip install de_pytt_bertbasecased_lg-2.1.0.tar.gz) With the previous models I used the following code to init my base model: <denchmark-code>import en_core_web_md nlp = en_core_web_md.load() </denchmark-code>
When I tried to do the same with the BERT model: <denchmark-code>import en_pytt_bertbaseuncased_lg nlp = en_pytt_bertbaseuncased_lg.load() </denchmark-code>
It seem that spacy is trying to reach out to in the model initialization in order to get the model's meat data and the vector's weights, and because I am behind proxy, it fails: <denchmark-code>Couldn't reach server at 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/models.huggingface.co/bert/bert-base-uncased-config.json' to download pretrained model configuration file. Couldn't reach server at 'https://s3.amazonaws.com/models.huggingface.co/bert/bert-base-uncased-pytorch_model.bin' to download pretrained weights. Traceback (most recent call last): File "C:/path/train.py", line 7, in <module> nlp = en_pytt_bertbaseuncased_lg.load() File "C:\env\lib\site-packages\en_pytt_bertbaseuncased_lg\__init__.py", line 12, in load return load_model_from_init_py(__file__, **overrides) File "C:\env\lib\site-packages\spacy\util.py", line 196, in load_model_from_init_py return load_model_from_path(data_path, meta, **overrides) File "C:\env\lib\site-packages\spacy\util.py", line 179, in load_model_from_path return nlp.from_disk(model_path) File "C:\env\lib\site-packages\spacy\language.py", line 832, in from_disk util.from_disk(path, deserializers, exclude) File "C:\env\lib\site-packages\spacy\util.py", line 636, in from_disk reader(path / key) File "C:\env\lib\site-packages\spacy\language.py", line 827, in <lambda> p, exclude=["vocab"] File "pipes.pyx", line 222, in spacy.pipeline.pipes.Pipe.from_disk File "C:\env\lib\site-packages\spacy\util.py", line 636, in from_disk reader(path / key) File "pipes.pyx", line 211, in spacy.pipeline.pipes.Pipe.from_disk.load_model File "C:\env\lib\site-packages\spacy_pytorch_transformers\tok2vec.py", line 63, in Model nO = pytt_model.nO File "C:\env\lib\site-packages\spacy_pytorch_transformers\wrapper.py", line 37, in nO return self._model.config.hidden_size AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'config' </denchmark-code>
Any solution?
